title: Clark, Hill and Scalextric's tribute to a classic Monaco duel
summary: Scalextric's 1963 Monaco Grand Prix Twin Car Pack revives the legendary duel between Jim Clark's Lotus 25 and Graham Hill's BRM P57 in 1:32 scale

qa_pairs.question: Which two drivers were involved in the legendary duel at the 1963 Monaco Grand Prix?
What type of model did Scalextric release to commemorate the 1963 Monaco Grand Prix duel?
What car did Jim Clark drive during the 1963 Monaco Grand Prix?
